item.description:
Sunday's Schedule at IFFBoston.

RSVP with the names of the films you plan to see, so that folks going to the same movies can organize getting together to share the experience.


Please feel free to post comments regarding any of the films, especially those being shown on another day so that we know what is worth seeing, and what is worth avoiding.

The full schedule for IFF is at
http://iffboston.festivalgenius.com/2012/schedule/week

 

12:15 PM   Downeast David Redmon, Ashley Sabin 2012 | Documentary | 78 min. Somerville Theatre 3  

12:15 PM   Shorts Package 4: Narratives Short Film | 101 min.

Somerville Theatre 5  

12:30 PM   Fairhaven Tom O'Brien 2012 | Narrative | 81 min. Somerville Theatre 1  

12:45 PM   Cerro Rico, Tierra Rica Juan Vallejo | Documentary | 100 min. Somerville Theatre 4  

2:30 PM   Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry Alison Klayman 2012 | Documentary | 90 min. Somerville Theatre 3  

2:30 PM   I Wish Kore-eda Hirokazu 2011 | Narrative | 128 min. Brattle Theatre   2:45 PM   The List Beth Murphy | Documentary | 82 min. Somerville Theatre 5  

3:00 PM   Shorts Package 3: Documentaries Short Film | 82 min. Somerville Theatre 2  

3:00 PM   EDITING DOCUMENTARIES: THE STORY BEHIND THE STORY Panel Discussion | 90 min. Somerville Microcinema  

3:15 PM   Love And Other Anxieties Lyda Kuth | Documentary | 66 min. Somerville Theatre 1  

3:30 PM   The Whirlpool Alvin Case | Narrative | 73 min. Somerville Theatre 4  

5:00 PM   Girl Model David Redmon, A. Sabin | Documentary | 77 min. Somerville Theatre 3  

5:15 PM   Wuthering Heights Andrea Arnold 2011 | Narrative | 129 min. Somerville Theatre 5  

5:30 PM   From Nothing, Something Tim Cawley | Documentary | 79 min. Somerville Theatre 1  

5:30 PM   Plimpton! Starring George Plimpton As Himself Luke Poling & Tom Bean | Documentary | 88 min. Brattle Theatre  

5:45 PM   Without Mark Jackson 2011 | Narrative | 87 min. Somerville Theatre 2  

6:00 PM   The Central Park Effect Jeffrey Kimball 2012 | Documentary | 60 min. Somerville Theatre 4  

7:30 PM   Just Like Being There Scout Shannon 2012 | Documentary | 90 min. Somerville Theatre 3   8:00 PM   Francine Narrative | 74 min. Brattle Theatre  

8:00 PM   Under African Skies Joe Berlinger | Documentary | 102 min. Somerville Theatre 1  

8:00 PM   Welcome to Pine Hill Keith Miller | Narrative | 80 min. Somerville Theatre 4  

8:15 PM   Trishna Michael Winterbottom 2011 | Narrative | 117 min. Somerville Theatre 2  

8:30 PM   Keyhole Guy Maddin 2011 | Narrative | 93 min. Somerville Theatre 5
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP with names of films you plan to attend. Scan the list to Meetup with others attending the same film.
item.name: Independent Film Festival Boston - Sunday
